BuxomMod:PopPopPop.NAME: Pop, Pop, Pop!
BuxomMod:PopPopPop.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! *Afterswell to your draw pile.

BuxomMod:BouncyExercise.NAME: Bouncy Exercise
BuxomMod:BouncyExercise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, and again if you gained BuxomMod:Buxom this turn. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Capacity.

BuxomMod:Chibis.NAME: Chibis!
BuxomMod:Chibis.DESCRIPTION: Randomly gain 4 buxommod:Lactating, 2 Strength, or 2 Dexterity X times.
BuxomMod:Chibis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomly gain 4 buxommod:Lactating, 2 Strength, or 2 Dexterity X+1 times.

BuxomMod:OmegaForce.NAME: Omega Force
BuxomMod:OmegaForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust all status cards in your hand, and gain 1 Strength for each.

BuxomMod:HeavyLactation.NAME: Heavy Lactation
BuxomMod:HeavyLactation.DESCRIPTION: Gain buxommod:Milk equal to your buxommod:Buxom. Heal equal to half your buxommod:Buxom. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:HeavyLactation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain buxommod:Milk equal to your Buxom. Heal equal to half your buxommod:Buxom. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
BuxomMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !BuxomMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

BuxomMod:OmegaFumes.NAME: Omega Fumes
BuxomMod:OmegaFumes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Add 2 *Afterswell to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:ExposureStatus.NAME: Exposure
BuxomMod:ExposureStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable.

BuxomMod:Omegabsorption.NAME: Omegabsorption
BuxomMod:Omegabsorption.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust a card. NL Gain !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! buxommod:Buxom. NL If it was a *Status card, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. Otherwise, lose 2 BuxomMod:Capacity.

BuxomMod:KCupBra.NAME: K-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:KCupBra.DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Bra. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Whenever you gain buxommod:Buxom, gain twice that much Block.

BuxomMod:MCupBra.NAME: M-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:MCupBra.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Bra. NL Whenever you gain buxommod:Buxom, gain !M! buxommod:Vigor.

BuxomMod:BrokenBraK.NAME: Broken Bra (K)
BuxomMod:BrokenBraK.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is Exhausted, gain !M! Dexterity.

BuxomMod:BrokenBraM.NAME: Broken Bra (M)
BuxomMod:BrokenBraM.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add 1 *Bounce to your draw pile. NL When this card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

BuxomMod:ChibiSummon.NAME: Chibi Summon
BuxomMod:ChibiSummon.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

BuxomMod:ButtonPop.NAME: Button Pop
BuxomMod:ButtonPop.DESCRIPTION: Gain !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Inflict !M! Weak.

BuxomMod:ButtonHazard.NAME: Button Hazard
BuxomMod:ButtonHazard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy whenever you gain BuxomMod:Buxom. NL BuxomMod:Milking 2: Deal !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! additional damage.

BuxomMod:LeanneAssist.NAME: Leanne Assist
BuxomMod:LeanneAssist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL BuxomMod:Repair your bra.

BuxomMod:Relief.NAME: Relief
BuxomMod:Relief.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you Exhaust a card.
BuxomMod:Relief.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you Exhaust a card.

BuxomMod:ToplessStatus.NAME: Topless
BuxomMod:ToplessStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL buxommod:Bouncy. NL When this card is Exhausted, draw !M! additional cards per turn.

BuxomMod:AftershockStatus.NAME: Afterswell
BuxomMod:AftershockStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! BuxomMod:Buxom.

BuxomMod:Library.NAME: Omega Library
BuxomMod:Library.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add buxommod:Rapidswell to your discard pile.

BuxomMod:OmegaLibrary.NAME: OMEGA Library
BuxomMod:OmegaLibrary.DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Bouncy. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! Buxom. NL Add *Omega *Library to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:MeasurementTime.NAME: Measurement Time
BuxomMod:MeasurementTime.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. NL Decreases by 4 each time your BuxomMod:Buxom increases.

BuxomMod:OmegaArc.NAME: Omega Arc
BuxomMod:OmegaArc.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If your BuxomMod:Bra is intact, damage ALL enemies.

BuxomMod:OmegaDeflection.NAME: Omega Deflection
BuxomMod:OmegaDeflection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Add 2 *Afterswell to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:OmegaShock.NAME: Omega Shock
BuxomMod:OmegaShock.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shocks to your draw pile, with !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! bonus damage for each time you gained buxommod:Buxom this turn. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:OmegaShock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shocks to your draw pile, with !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! bonus damage for each time you gained buxommod:Buxom this turn. NL Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:SwellingTight.NAME: Swelling Tight
BuxomMod:SwellingTight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 BuxomMod:Buxom and lose 3 BuxomMod:Capacity. NL If your BuxomMod:Bra is intact, gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:SwellingTight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 BuxomMod:Buxom and lose 3 BuxomMod:Capacity. NL If your BuxomMod:Bra is intact, gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:Phew.NAME: Phew!
BuxomMod:Phew.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! BuxomMod:Buxom. NL If BuxomMod:Exposed, remove BuxomMod:Exposed. NL Gain !B! Block.

BuxomMod:TCupBra.NAME: T-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:TCupBra.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Bra. NL Gain !M! Thorns each time your BuxomMod:Buxom increases.

BuxomMod:BrokenBraT.NAME: Broken T-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:BrokenBraT.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add 2 *Afterswell to your draw pile.

BuxomMod:ChibiOneTwo.NAME: Chibi One-Two
BuxomMod:ChibiOneTwo.DESCRIPTION: If buxommod:Exposed, gain !M! Strength. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

BuxomMod:OmegaFlare.NAME: Omega Flare
BuxomMod:OmegaFlare.DESCRIPTION: If you're within the BuxomMod:Capacity of your bra, gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! *Afterswell into your draw pile.
BuxomMod:OmegaFlare.CANT_USE_MESSAGE: I'm not within my bra's capacity!

BuxomMod:SteadyLactation.NAME: Steady Lactation
BuxomMod:SteadyLactation.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 buxommod:Rapidswell to your draw pile. NL Add *Lactating to your draw pile. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:SteadyLactation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have less than 11 BuxomMod:Buxom, gain BuxomMod:Buxom up to 11. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Lactating. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk.

BuxomMod:Paizuri.NAME: Paizuri
BuxomMod:Paizuri.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Embarrassing. NL If the enemy intends to attack, inflict !M! Weak and draw !M! cards.

BuxomMod:OmegaBeatdown.NAME: Omega Beatdown
BuxomMod:OmegaBeatdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half your BuxomMod:Buxom (!BuxomMod:BuxomHalfDamage!) !M! times. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:OmegaBeatdown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half your BuxomMod:Buxom (!BuxomMod:BuxomHalfDamage!) !M! times. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:ExpandMind.NAME: Expand Mind
BuxomMod:ExpandMind.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain your hand this turn. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:ExpandMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain your hand this turn. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

BuxomMod:InducedLactation.NAME: Induced Lactation
BuxomMod:InducedLactation.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Embarrassing. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk. NL Add 1 *Afterswell to your hand.

BuxomMod:BraBreaker.NAME: Bra Breaker
BuxomMod:BraBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable if buxommod:Bra is broken. NL Gain enough BuxomMod:Buxom to break your Bra. NL Deal !M! damage for each existing Status card and BuxomMod:Bra broken this combat. *Big *Bounces count double. NL (Deals !D! damage.)

BuxomMod:BigBouncePowerCard.NAME: Big Bounce
BuxomMod:BigBouncePowerCard.DESCRIPTION: Increase your max *Bounce stacks by 2. NL Create *Big *Bounces instead of *Bounces.
BuxomMod:BigBouncePowerCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Increase your max *Bounce stacks by 2. NL Create *Big *Bounces instead of *Bounces.

BuxomMod:BigBounceStatus.NAME: Big Bounce
BuxomMod:BigBounceStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, deal damage to a random enemy equal to half your Buxom.

BuxomMod:OmegaBurst.NAME: Omega Burst
BuxomMod:OmegaBurst.DESCRIPTION: {@@}buxommod:Expose. NL Scry 20. NL Draw 2 cards. NL This turn, whenever you gain BuxomMod:Buxom or draw a Status card, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:BouncyBlock.NAME: Bouncy Block
BuxomMod:BouncyBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Vigor for every Status card in your hand.

BuxomMod:FeelItOut.NAME: Feel It Out
BuxomMod:FeelItOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw all the Status cards in your draw pile.

BuxomMod:Hardheaded.NAME: Hardheaded
BuxomMod:Hardheaded.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust 1 card.

BuxomMod:QuiteEnough.NAME: Quite Enough
BuxomMod:QuiteEnough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Add 2 *Bounce to your draw pile.

BuxomMod:ShockStatus.NAME: Shock
BuxomMod:ShockStatus.DESCRIPTION: {@@}buxommod:Bouncy. NL When this card is drawn, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Enemy loses !D! HP. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:WhiteBikiniBra.NAME: White Bikini
BuxomMod:WhiteBikiniBra.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk at the start of your turn. NL At the end of combat, if your BuxomMod:Bra is intact, gain 2 BuxomMod:Buxom permanently.

BuxomMod:BrokenBraWhiteBikini.NAME: Broken White Bikini
BuxomMod:BrokenBraWhiteBikini.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, gain !M! buxommod:Milk.

BuxomMod:WardrobeMalfunction.NAME: Malfunction
BuxomMod:WardrobeMalfunction.DESCRIPTION: {@@}buxommod:Expose. NL Gain !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! Vigor. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

BuxomMod:Embarrassment.NAME: Embarrassment
BuxomMod:Embarrassment.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! buxommod:Buxom. NL Whenever you buxommod:Expose, gain !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! Strength.

BuxomMod:Flee.NAME: Flee
BuxomMod:Flee.DESCRIPTION: {@@}BuxomMod:Embarrassing. NL Exhaust up to !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If buxommod:Exposed, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

BuxomMod:Surprise.NAME: Surprise!
BuxomMod:Surprise.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, buxommod:Expose and gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:Surprise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Next turn, buxommod:Expose and gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:HungryDwarf.NAME: Hungry Dwarf
BuxomMod:HungryDwarf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target dies, gain 5 buxommod:Buxom, !M! buxommod:Milk, and [E] [E].
BuxomMod:HungryDwarf.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target dies, gain 5 buxommod:Buxom, !M! buxommod:Milk, and [E] [E] [E].

BuxomMod:ChaosDunk.NAME: Chaos Dunk!
BuxomMod:ChaosDunk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, and again for each *Status card in your hand.
BuxomMod:ChaosDunk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, and again for each *Status card in your hand.

BuxomMod:Smother.NAME: Smother
BuxomMod:Smother.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you draw a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

BuxomMod:Submission.NAME: Submission
BuxomMod:Submission.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Embarrassing. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Gain !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:ChibiChampion.NAME: Chibi Champion
BuxomMod:ChibiChampion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain 1 Strength for every !M! Milk you have.

BuxomMod:OmegaContagion.NAME: Omega Contagion
BuxomMod:OmegaContagion.DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Anatomical. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:OmegaCurse.NAME: Omega Corruption
BuxomMod:OmegaCurse.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] , gain 4 buxommod:Buxom, and Exhaust a random card in your hand, X times. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:OmegaCurse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] , gain 4 buxommod:Buxom, and Exhaust a card in your hand, X times. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:PanicLactation.NAME: Panic Lactation
BuxomMod:PanicLactation.DESCRIPTION: When you play a *Common card this turn, gain !M! buxommod:Milk.
BuxomMod:PanicLactation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you play a *Common card this turn, gain !M! buxommod:Milk.

BuxomMod:BouncingLactation.NAME: Bouncing Lactation
BuxomMod:BouncingLactation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Milk. NL If buxommod:Exposed, gain !M! additional buxommod:Milk.
BuxomMod:BouncingLactation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Milk. NL If buxommod:Exposed, gain !M! additional buxommod:Milk.

BuxomMod:BraCloset.NAME: Bra Closet
BuxomMod:BraCloset.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! buxommod:Capacity. NL Draw !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:BraCloset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Capacity. NL Draw !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:LactatingStatus.NAME: Lactating
BuxomMod:LactatingStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk.

BuxomMod:Rapidswell.NAME: Rapidswell
BuxomMod:Rapidswell.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! BuxomMod:Buxom.

BuxomMod:OmegaDuplication.NAME: Omega Duplication
BuxomMod:OmegaDuplication.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! buxommod:Buxom. NL This turn, your next Skill is played twice.

BuxomMod:ChibiCommand.NAME: Chibi Command
BuxomMod:ChibiCommand.DESCRIPTION: Play the top two cards of your draw pile. NL If a card played this way is a Status card, gain !M! Strength and play another.

BuxomMod:BrainDrain.NAME: Brain Drain
BuxomMod:BrainDrain.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain 1 buxommod:Buxom for each card in your hand. NL Discard your hand. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

BuxomMod:OmegaBonk.NAME: Omega Bonk
BuxomMod:OmegaBonk.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Bounce{!M!|>1=s} into your draw pile.

BuxomMod:HeavyDutyBra.NAME: Heavy-Duty Bra
BuxomMod:HeavyDutyBra.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! BuxomMod:Capacity. NL BuxomMod:Repair your bra. NL Gain !B! Block.

BuxomMod:MassiveGrowth.NAME: Massive Growth
BuxomMod:MassiveGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Discard 2 random cards. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Buxom. NL Permanently increase this card's buxommod:Buxom gain by !BuxomMod:SecondMagic!. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:MassiveGrowth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Discard 2 random cards. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Buxom. NL Permanently increase this card's buxommod:Buxom gain by !BuxomMod:SecondMagic!. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:WatcherCosplay.NAME: Watcher Cosplay
BuxomMod:WatcherCosplay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain buxommod:Milk equal to unblocked damage dealt.

BuxomMod:OmegaThorns.NAME: Omega Thorns
BuxomMod:OmegaThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Gain !M! additional Thorns for every !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! buxommod:Buxom you have.

BuxomMod:SilentCosplay.NAME: Silent Cosplay
BuxomMod:SilentCosplay.DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Expose. NL Add !M! *Shiv *Chibi to your hand and shuffle 1 *Shiv *Chibi into your draw pile.

BuxomMod:ShivChibi.NAME: Shiv Chibi
BuxomMod:ShivChibi.DESCRIPTION: Bouncy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:OmegaRunes.NAME: Omega Runes
BuxomMod:OmegaRunes.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! maximum *Bounce stack{!M!|>1=s}. NL Repair your BuxomMod:Bra.

BuxomMod:ChargedChibi.NAME: Charged Chibi
BuxomMod:ChargedChibi.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL BuxomMod:Bouncy. NL If *Exhausted, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

BuxomMod:LactatingSkill.NAME: Lactating
BuxomMod:LactatingSkill.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Bouncy. NL Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk.
